title: 1-Bedroom 1-bath apartment, Art Deco high-rise, doorman, pkng avail
posting_body: ['Mazal55Properties', 'The apartment is in a very well-maintained doorman building, with classic architecture and details from the 1930s.', 'Features:', 'Approximately 1050 sqft', 'Large living room', 'Formal dining room', 'Updated kitchen, featuring:', 'Dishwasher', 'Gas oven and range', 'Built-in microwave oven', 'French-door refrigerator', 'Lots of cabinet space', 'Granite counter tops', 'Hallway with a large walk-in closet and an additional linen closet', 'Well-apportioned bedroom, with a walk-in closet featuring built-in drawers and shelving', 'Mostly original Art Deco bathroom, featuring:', 'Original tiling and porcelain fixtures', 'Separate bathtub and shower stall', 'Built-in towel cabinet', 'Double-pane windows throughout', 'Great location:', 'Within walking distance to restaurants and shops on Fillmore and Union Streets', 'Close to Chestnut and Polk Streets', 'Close to Lafayette and Alta Plaza Parks', 'Major transportation lines are nearby', 'Easy access to the northbound 101 freeway', 'Other notes:', 'Cats are okay', 'Parking for one car is available for an additional $250/mo', 'The building has a doorman, an elevator, and an on-site common laundry facility', 'The included utilities and services are water, waste disposal, and heating', 'The minimum lease term is 12 months', 'Contact information:', 'Mazal Bordo', 'Relocation Agent', 'CalBRE #: 01243370', 'show contact info', '<URL>']
